ing: 1 (12 ounce) package tofu, drained and cut into cubes
des: "This tofu mayonnaise is great for anyone who is lactose-intolerant or vegan. It's real thick and creamy and you can add seasonings to fit your fancy!  Great for pasta salads or anywhere you'd use mayonnaise."
ins: Place the tofu, sesame oil, cider vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper into the container of a blender. Blend until smooth. Drizzle the peanut oil in a thin stream while blending until thick and pale. Use promptly.
